scripts.release: yarn version --patch && git tag -a "v$npm_package_version" -m "version $npm_package_version" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.licenses: find node_modules -name package.json -exec jq -r '.|"\(.name),\(.version),\(.license)"' {} \; | sort | uniq > cx-portal/public/third-party-licenses.txt
